results.summary: An 18-year-old man is charged with the murder of a rapper who was stabbed to death in Birmingham.
results.body: <body xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/69ae1f49-6233-fe48-b10c-05b70eaf5b14"><image id="70081310"/><paragraph role="introduction">An 18-year-old man has been charged with the murder of a rapper who was stabbed to death in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera, 18, was attacked outside TC's club in Selly Oak at about 23:00 BST on Friday. A post-mortem examination found he died from a stab wound to the heart.</paragraph><paragraph>Armani Mitchell, from The Green in Northfield, was arrested on Saturday.</paragraph><paragraph>He is due to appear before magistrates in Birmingham on Tuesday morning.</paragraph><paragraph>An 18-year-old man from Edgbaston who was arrested on Sunday has been released on bail pending further inquiries.</paragraph><paragraph>Mr Ribera had been attending an event at the club in memory of Kyle Sheehan who died after being stabbed in the leg in Birmingham a year ago. </paragraph><paragraph>Members of the music industry joined Mr Ribera's friends in paying tribute to the up and coming grime musician, who went by the stage name Depzman.</paragraph><paragraph>West Midlands Police said they were still keen to speak to anyone who witnessed the attack in Selly Oak on Friday night.</paragraph></body>
results.shortFormBody: <shortFormBody xmlns="http://www.bbc.co.uk/asset" xml:space="preserve" xml:base="http://www.bbc.co.uk/article/69ae1f49-6233-fe48-b10c-05b70eaf5b14"><paragraph>An 18-year-old man has been charged with the murder of a rapper who was stabbed to death in Birmingham.</paragraph><paragraph>Joshua Ribera, 18, was attacked outside TC's club in Selly Oak at about 23:00 BST on Friday. A post-mortem examination found he died from a stab wound to the heart.</paragraph><paragraph>Armani Mitchell, from The Green in Northfield, was arrested on Saturday.</paragraph><paragraph>He is due to appear before magistrates in Birmingham on Tuesday morning.</paragraph></shortFormBody>

70081310.caption: Joshua Ribera was stabbed outside TC's club in Selly Oak

results.headline: Joshua Ribera: Man charged over rapper stab death
results.shortHeadline: Man charged over rapper stab death
